title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
**Experience the Timeless Magic of Barbie**

Get ready to enter a world of perfection and wonder with the Blu-Ray + Digital release of Barbie. Join Barbie as she navigates the ups and downs of life in Barbie Land, where even the most flawless of beings can experience existential crises and the occasional identity crisis of being a Ken.

This unforgettable film is not just a movie – it's an immersive experience that will transport you to a world of beauty, music, and magic. With stunning visuals, captivating characters, and a story that will touch your heart, Barbie is a must-have for fans of all ages.

But that's not all – this special Blu-Ray + Digital release comes packed with exclusive bonus content, including:

- **It's a Weird World**: A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the film
- **All-Star Barbie Party**: Join the cast for a fun-filled celebration of all things Barbie
- **Musical Make-Believe**: Get a glimpse into the creation of the iconic musical numbers
- **Becoming Barbie**: Go behind the scenes with Margot Robbie as she transforms into the iconic character
- **Welcome to Barbie Land**: Take a tour of the film's stunning sets and locations
- **Playing Dress-Up: An Extended Look at the Costumes of Barbie**: Get up close and personal with the incredible costumes that bring Barbie's world to life

Whether you're a lifelong fan of Barbie or just discovering the magic of this beloved character, this Blu-Ray + Digital release is the perfect way to experience the film in all its glory. So why wait? Bring Barbie into your home today and get ready to be transported to a world of wonder and enchantment.
